title: Best of The Program | Guests: Ken Paxton & Nic McKinley | 10/20/21
description:
Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton joins to discuss the immigration crisis at the border and vaccine mandates in Texas. Glenn goes over the biblical story from Samuel of Israel begging for a king and compares that to modern-day politics. Nic McKinley, founder and executive director of DeliverFund, joins Glenn to discuss the Afghan rescue mission — and how the rescue missions aren't over.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
